page.title: 17What Jobs People Have.
page.content: The local people are engaged mainly in the agricultural, horticultural or forstry industries or the related trades. A few people are retired or semi-retired estate workers with part time or seasonal employment. Some of the remainder are long distance commuters or are engaged in a variety of trades and professions working from home and/or in nearby towns, there are few without work. Some of the more unusual occupations that we discovered included a self taught piano tuner and a wood carver. There were few people who practised the ancient rural crafts of hedge laying, dry stone walling or thatching.
